about_the_game:
【About the game】

◆ Caution ◆
All in-game text has been translated using machine translation.

◆ Story ◆
The protagonist, Atsushi Kiriyatou, ends up living with his new stepmother and her daughter from a previous marriage due to his father's recent remarriage. However, this mother and daughter duo are incredibly toxic, and Atsushi's daily life starts falling apart rapidly. Unable to bear it any longer, Atsushi confides in an acquaintance he met through an online game.

"Well then, I'll give you something good. Something amazing that will change your life."

With this, Atsushi receives a special hypnotic drug from the acquaintance and swears revenge against the unbearable gal mother and daughter duo...


◆Motion Events◆
Some event scenes use motion animation to create a more realistic effect than ever before.
NOTE.
All event scenes do not include motion.


◆Regarding the location of SaveData◆
Save data is created within the Users folder in Windows.
Please perform backups and deletion of save data from the following location.





【Character Introduction】


- A lewd, busty, and voluptuous gal who can't get enough of her body -

◆Ikumi Kiritani

Height: 171cm
Three sizes：B120 (M cup)/W65/H98

She is Natsumi's mother and the stepmother of the protagonist. She deceived the protagonist's father and remarried, becoming a malicious woman. When the father is not around, she shows her true nature and treats the protagonist like a nuisance. However, even she falls victim to a hypnotic drug, mistaking the protagonist for her "adorable son." After being under its influence, she continues to act disinterested in the protagonist in front of Natsumi, as usual. But when they are alone, she transforms into an overly sweet and overprotective mom, exhibiting a drastic change in behavior.






- A female gal who licks her brother to perfection. -

◆Natsuki Kiritani

Height: 164cm
Three sizes：B102(K-cup)/W58/H93

Ikumi's daughter is the same age as the protagonist, but because Natsumi's birthday is two months later, she ends up being considered his younger sister. However, she is not happy about this arrangement and cannot stand being in the protagonist's shadow. As a result, she treats him coldly and, just like her mother, acts like a servant when her father is not around. This time, due to the protagonist's hypnotism, she starts recognizing him as her "beloved, cool older brother" and actively tries to get his attention through proactive body communication and acting affectionately to somehow capture his interest.


※Japanese voice recording (※male characters are not recorded)


◆ Game Specifications ◆

・Novel game that progresses with a click
・Heroine fully voiced
・CG mode
・Scene recollection


◆ Content Warning ◆
This game includes content that may not be suitable for all ages and may not be appropriate for display in the workplace.
The game contains nudity or sexual content, as well as general adult-oriented content.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content that is not appropriate for all ages or for viewing in the workplace. This game contains content that is not appropriate for all ages or for viewing in the workplace. Nudity or sexual content, general adult content

fullgame.name: Gal Mothers and Daughters who love sex

name: 完堕ちXギャル母娘 ～ マジ気持ちイイ！アタシたち、アンタの肉オナホにされちゃう ～ Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound
  • Additional Notes: Japanese language must be displayed and usable.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: 2+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound
  • Additional Notes: Japanese language must be displayed and usable.

Drastische Gewalt
Drogen

short_description: Enjoy the process of the timid protagonist using hypnosis to manipulate and subjugate his abusive mother and daughter, training them to his liking.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
